title: Brick-Oven Pizza-Making Class with Wine or Beer for One, Two, or Four at AOA Bar and Grill (Up to 46% Off)
shortTitle: Up to 46% Off Pizza-Making Class
description: Choose from Three Options $69 for a two-hour pizza-making class for one person, with three glasses of wine or beer ($116 value) $129 for a two-hour pizza-making class for two people, with three glasses of wine or beer each ($232 value) $249 for a two-hour pizza-making class for four people, with three glasses of wine or beer each ($464 value) Classes take place from 1:30 p.m. to 3:30 p.m. on the second Saturday of each month During this two-hour class, students learn the ins and outs of crafting homemade pizza under the tutelage of professional pizza chefs. Students learn to knead and stretch a thin crust, then adorn it with sauce, cheese, and toppings in the proper ratios. After baking all samples in the wood-burning brick oven, students undergo the real test by sampling their creations, with some extra credit awarded to noteworthy pies.
finePrint: Reservation required by email only. Classes offered on the second Saturday of every month from 1:30-3:30p.m. Merchant is solely responsible for all sales and delivery of alcohol. Limit 1 per person, may buy 1 additional as gift(s). May be repurchased every 30 days. Limit 1 per visit. Must use promotional value in 1 visit(s). Valid only for option purchased. Must provide 21+ ID to receive alcoholic beverages. Alcohol is not discounted more than 50%.
